# Preamble [color=#ff0000]WARNING: You MUST be at least 18 years of age to play on Floof Station.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Floof Station is an English-based community; use English as your primary method of communication within the game.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Rule 0. Admins can disregard any and all of these rules if they deem it in the best interest of the current round, server, and/or community at large. Admins are held fully accountable for their actions if they exercise this privilege.[/color]
If you have any questions about these rules, please use the admin help menu by hitting F1 in-game, or clicking the "AHelp" button in the lobby.
Intentionally disconnecting, responding with hostility, or refusing to respond when an admin privately messages you in Ahelp or a Discord ticket will be met with an appeal-only ban.[/color]
All AHelp messages are relayed to the Floof Station Discord.
# Common sense reminders: [color=#ffff00]The usage of any applications/scripts/client modifications or any other applicable software to gain an advantage, avoid intended game/server mechanics, or to harm server infrastructure is strictly prohibited, resulting in an unappealable ban, and may additionally result in legal action.[/color] [color=#ffff00]Attempting to evade bans will result in an appeal-only ban.[/color] [color=#ffff00]Do not Multi-key.[/color] [color=#ffff00]Lack of administrator/Centcom response does not equal permission.[/color] [color=#ffff00]Security standard operating procedures are meta-shielded, no in-game rule lawyering (Leave it for the lawyers).[/color]
